meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jamie O'Hagin Rich Zayatz Josh Powell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6037.

td.p: Jamie O'Hagin, a museum education coordinator from Center Tuftonboro, New Hampshire
Rich Zayatz, an emergency police dispatcher from Asheville, North Carolina
Josh Powell, a phone-based health coach from San Diego, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $12,500)

tr.td: LOST IN SPACE
TIMELESS TV
LET'S HIT IT
WORLD BOOK DESCRIBES THE "G" MAN
MONEY SLANG
RVs
